description.english: Now you have a handgun
description.german: Jetzt hast du eine Pistole
description.french: Maintenant tu as une arme de poing
description.italian: Now you have a handgun
description.spanish: Ahora tienes una pistola
description.portuguese: Agora você tem uma arma

description.english: My first silent kill
description.german: Jetzt kann ich lautlos töten
description.french: Maintenant je peux tuer tranquillement
description.italian: La mia prima uccisione silenziosa
description.spanish: Ahora puedo matar tranquilamente
description.portuguese: Minha primeira morte silenciosa

description.english: Set the radio to the right frequency
description.german: Stellen Sie das Radio auf die richtige Frequenz ein
description.french: Réglez la radio sur la bonne fréquence
description.italian: Imposta la radio sulla frequenza corretta
description.spanish: Configura la radio en la frecuencia correcta
description.portuguese: Defina o rádio para a frequência certa

description.english: Now the park gates are open
description.german: Jetzt sind die Parktore geöffnet
description.french: Maintenant les portes du parc sont ouvertes
description.italian: Ora i cancelli del parco sono aperti
description.spanish: Ahora las puertas del parque están abiertas
description.portuguese: Agora os portões do parque estão abertos

description.english: The statues are waking up
description.german: Die Statuen erwachen
description.french: Les statues se réveillent
description.italian: Le statue si stanno svegliando
description.spanish: Las estatuas están despertando
description.portuguese: As estátuas estão acordando

description.english: You committed your first silent kill
description.german: Du hast deinen ersten stillen Mord begangen
description.french: Vous avez commis votre premier meurtre silencieux
description.italian: Hai commesso la tua prima uccisione silenziosa
description.spanish: Cometiste tu primera muerte silenciosa
description.russian: Вы совершили свое первое тихое убийство
description.portuguese: Você cometeu sua primeira morte silenciosa

description.english: Insert two fuses into the electrical panel
description.german: Setzen Sie zwei Sicherungen in die Schalttafel ein
description.french: Insérez deux fusibles dans le panneau électrique
description.italian: Inserire due fusibili nel quadro elettrico
description.spanish: Inserte dos fusibles en el panel eléctrico.
description.schinese: 将两根保险丝插入配电板。
description.tchinese: 將兩根保險絲插入配電板。
description.portuguese: Insira dois fusíveis no painel elétrico
description.polish: Włóż dwa bezpieczniki do panelu elektrycznego

description.english: Solve a difficult puzzle
description.german: Löse ein schwieriges Rätsel
description.french: Résoudre un puzzle difficile
description.italian: Risolvi un enigma difficile
description.spanish: Resolver un rompecabezas difícil
description.portuguese: Resolva um quebra-cabeça difícil

description.english: Learn how to reveal invisible ink
description.german: Erfahren Sie, wie Sie unsichtbare Tinte enthüllen
description.french: Apprenez à révéler l'encre invisible
description.italian: Scopri come rivelare l'inchiostro invisibile
description.spanish: Aprende a revelar la tinta invisible
description.schinese: 学会如何制备化学显影剂。
description.tchinese: 學會如何製備化學顯影劑。
description.portuguese: Aprenda a revelar tinta invisível
description.polish: Dowiedz się, jak odkryć niewidzialny atrament

displayName.spanish: La amenaza de las cajas fuertes

description.english: Now I know the combination of this safe
description.german: Jetzt kenne ich die Kombination dieses Safes
description.french: Maintenant je connais la combinaison de ce coffre-fort
description.italian: Ora conosco la combinazione di questa cassaforte
description.spanish: Ahora sé la combinación de esta caja fuerte.
description.russian: Теперь я знаю комбинацию от этого сейфа
description.portuguese: Agora eu sei a combinação deste cofre

description.english: Start the old electric chair
description.german: Starten Sie den alten elektrischen Stuhl
description.french: Démarrer la vieille chaise électrique
description.italian: Avvia la vecchia sedia elettrica
description.spanish: Arranca la vieja silla eléctrica
description.portuguese: Comece a velha cadeira elétrica

description.english: Watch the tutorial on the videotape
description.german: Sehen Sie sich das Tutorial auf dem Videoband an
description.french: Regardez le tutoriel sur la bande vidéo
description.italian: Guarda il tutorial in videocassetta
description.spanish: Mira el tutorial en la cinta de video.
description.schinese: 观看录像带里的教学视频。
description.tchinese: 觀看錄影帶裏的教學視頻。
description.portuguese: Assista ao tutorial na fita de vídeo

description.english: It was very difficult to get the key from the sink
description.german: It was very difficult to get the key from the sink
description.french: Il était très difficile d'obtenir la clé de l'évier
description.italian: È stato molto difficile prendere la chiave dal lavandino
description.spanish: Fue muy difícil sacar la llave del fregadero.
description.schinese: 费尽九牛二虎之力从水管中获得钥匙。
description.tchinese: 費盡九牛二虎之力從水管中獲得鑰匙。
description.russian: Было очень сложно достать ключ из раковины
description.portuguese: Foi muito difícil tirar a chave da pia
description.polish: Bardzo trudno było wyciągnąć klucz ze zlewu

description.english: Now I am stronger, I have a shotgun
description.german: Jetzt bin ich stärker, ich habe eine Schrotflinte
description.french: Maintenant je suis plus fort, j'ai un fusil de chasse
description.italian: Ora sono più forte, ho un fucile
description.spanish: Ahora soy más fuerte, tengo una escopeta
description.russian: Теперь я стал сильнее у меня есть дробовик
description.portuguese: Agora eu sou mais forte, eu tenho uma espingarda

description.english: You entered the right code, it's unlocked
description.german: Du hast den richtigen Code eingegeben, er ist entsperrt
description.french: Vous avez entré le bon code, il est déverrouillé
description.italian: Hai inserito il codice giusto, è sbloccato
description.spanish: Ingresaste el código correcto, está desbloqueado
description.russian: Вы ввели верный код, замок открыт
description.portuguese: Você digitou o código certo, ele está desbloqueado

description.english: You performed the sacrificial ritual
description.german: Du hast das Opferritual durchgeführt
description.french: Vous avez effectué le rituel sacrificiel
description.italian: Hai eseguito il rituale sacrificale
description.spanish: Has realizado el ritual del sacrificio.
description.portuguese: Você realizou o ritual de sacrifício

description.english: Collecting puzzles is your calling
description.german: Puzzles zu sammeln ist deine Berufung
description.french: Boîte Maudite
description.italian: Collecting puzzles is your calling
description.spanish: Coleccionar rompecabezas es tu vocación.
description.portuguese: Coletar quebra-cabeças é sua vocação

description.english: How long you live matters
description.german: Wie lange du lebst, ist wichtig
description.french: Combien de temps vous vivez compte
description.italian: Quanto tempo vivi conta
description.spanish: Cuánto tiempo vives importa
description.portuguese: Quanto tempo você vive importa

description.english: You answered all questions correctly
description.german: Sie haben alle Fragen richtig beantwortet
description.french: Vous avez répondu correctement à toutes les questions
description.italian: Hai risposto correttamente a tutte le domande
description.spanish: Respondiste todas las preguntas correctamente
description.russian: Вы ответили верно на все вопросы
description.portuguese: Você respondeu todas as perguntas corretamente

description.english: The entrance to the church grounds is now open
description.german: Der Eingang zum Kirchengelände ist jetzt geöffnet
description.french: L'entrée du parc de l'église est maintenant ouverte
description.italian: L'ingresso al cortile della chiesa è ora aperto
description.spanish: La entrada a los terrenos de la iglesia ya está abierta.
description.russian: Вход на территорию церкви теперь открыт
description.portuguese: A entrada para o terreno da igreja está agora aberta
description.polish: Wejście na teren kościoła jest już otwarte

description.english: You beat the villain in a dishonest fight
description.german: Du hast den Bösewicht in einem unehrlichen Kampf besiegt
description.french: Vous avez battu le méchant dans un combat malhonnête
description.italian: Hai battuto il cattivo in una lotta disonesta
description.spanish: Vence al villano en una pelea deshonesta
description.russian: Вы победили злодея в нечестном бою
description.portuguese: Você vence o vilão em uma luta desonesta

description.english: You have heard the raven's prophecies
description.german: Du hast die Prophezeiungen des Raben gehört
description.french: Vous avez entendu les prophéties du corbeau
description.italian: Hai ascoltato le profezie del corvo
description.spanish: Has oído las profecías del cuervo
description.portuguese: Você ouviu as profecias do Corvo
